message: Hi Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a lot to the right person. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I'm confident it will be highly valuable for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a significant discount from what I believe its true value is.  If you're interested, let me know and I'll be happy to provide more details.  If not, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $10000.
